article_title: How Insurers Curb Costly Hips, Knees And Other Medical Devices

article_metadata.description: The medical device industry, already feeling the brunt of a tax to help fund the Affordable Care Act, is seeing a dramatic increase in insurance company strategies curtailing the use of newer technologies. Insurance companies are ramping up myriad new payment strategies impacting manufacturers and sales of their new devices and [...]
